https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9BmTv2Q2bHjJUlcMKrXwdTh5z17.jpg A young wizard must create new spells in his magic book before the planets align. His uncle and aunt, powerful mages themselves, help him achieve that. Based on the award-winning Brazilian TV series. Castelo Rá-Tim-Bum: O Filme
